topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5312a9aa6368721f1a5f0000#post_5312a9aa6368721f1a5f0000
War! 
Hoo! Good god ya'll!
What is it good for?!
Making needle dick politicians feel like a badass without any personal risk of their own!

By the way, I'm a former soldier. I did a tour in Iraq and one in Afghanistan. At no point did it ever look like we were defending freedom but watching the news I distinctly got the impression that we were getting shot at in the 110 degree heat so assholes back home could feel like they were awesome by proxy. Hell, even if we were literally over there for oil at least that would have been a fucking end goal.

"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5312ae6b6368721dbd710100#post_5312ae6b6368721dbd710100
Considering the shit the taliban do during firefights I don't think I want to know.

A old buddy of mine got seriously fucked up in the head and didn't sign on for a another tour cause some kid's asswipe mom put a bomb on her kid and then told the kid go say hi to "the nice american soldiers".  Hearing him recount the story and shaking at how he pulled the trigger. .  I knew he was trying to keep together as best as he could, but fuck, I hope the mother rots in hell for all eternity.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5312b3896368722340370300#post_5312b3896368722340370300
I may have never been a soldier, but seeing how bad some of the shit fucks people up is why I'm so against war.

Warhawks go, "Fuck yeah 'MURRICA!  Let's show them terrorists how l33t we are!" and have never seen war and never seen what it's done to people and have never listened to veterans.

I don't ever want to sign up for the army, cause unlike the drop dead retards that think war is like Rambo I actually listen to veterans and I'd be too shit scarred to join.

My biological father was a veteran, my step dad was a veteran, my brother is a veteran and I've had a lot of soldier friends; the shit I've heard from veterans.  Non-veterans think war is like rambo and that troops are running into battlefields wearing no armor and just mowing down enemies are fucking retards.  What's even worse is that some of these fucking retards sign up for duty.  I've heard from drill sergeants about recruits going, "Sarge; where's the medkit?  You know that thing in case you're shot in the face that will regen your health?  What about the power armor?"

Tl:dr; I may not be in the army, but I've heard about the shit you see during war and it does indeed sound shit your pants terrifying.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
